#summary Index File.
#labels Phase-Implementation

By default, the index file looks like this:
{{{
<?php
define('NUDIR', '../nu');
include NUDIR.'/engine/nu.php';

$nu = new Nu();
# PUT YOUR CUSTOM CODE HERE
$nu->run();
?>
}}}

If you wish to manipulate your Nu instance, put your code under the comment.

===Changing the Configuration File===
You can change the default configuration file to load by writing:
{{{
$nu->setConfig('newconfig');
}}}
This will load {{{newconfig.php}}} under your config directory {{{(./nu/application/config)}}}, instead of {{{config.php}}}.

===Changing the Routes File===
You can change the default routes file to load by writing:
{{{
$nu->setRoutes('newroutes');
}}}
This will load {{{newroutes.php}}} under your routes directory {{{(./nu/application/routes)}}}, instead of {{{routes.php}}}.
